text: Rolf Johan Lenschow (9 August 1928 – 24 April 2014) was a Norwegian civil engineer. He was born in Hauge i Dalane. He graduated from the Norwegian Institute of Technology in 1954 took his PhD in 1966 at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. He became professor in concrete construction at the Norwegian Institute of Technology in 1968, and later served as rector of the University of Trondheim from 1987 to 1993. He was a member of the Norwegian Academy of Technological Sciences. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Sokndal Category:Norwegian Institute of Technology alumni Category:University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign alumni Category:Norwegian expatriates in the United States Category:Norwegian engineers Category:Rectors of universities and colleges in Norway Category:Members of the Norwegian Academy of Technological Sciences
title: Rolf Johan Lenschow
